full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 763 Filed 08/10/22 Page 133 of 197 2674
LCHVMAX4 Healy - direct
1 A. I was working at Pete's Tavern.
2 Q. And I think you said your sister was working at J. Epstein; is that right?
3 A. Yes, she was a receptionist.
4 Q. And at some point did someone ask you to come fill in? Do you know who that was?
5 A. I can't recall that.
6 Q. Okay. But your sister was working there before you?
7 A. Yes.
8 Q. And when you came to fill in, what job did you do when you came to fill in at J. Epstein and Company?
9 A. Just errands.
10 Q. And where was J. Epstein and Company?
11 A. 457 Madison Avenue.
12 Q. How long did you end up working at J. Epstein and Company?
13 A. I think I was there from 1996 until about 1999.
14 Q. And where did you go in 1999?
15 A. I went to New Mexico.
16 Q. So just focusing on that period of time, 1996 to 1999, while you were working at J. Epstein and Company, did you meet Jeffrey Epstein?
17 A. Yes.
18 Q. How did you meet him?
19 A. He was my boss.
20 Q. And what were your roles and responsibilities during that
SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
DOJ-OGR-00014239
